mapper.select: SELECT id, question, answer, is_owner as isOwner, restaurant_id as restaurantId, is_active as isActive, created_at as createdAt FROM restaurant_qna WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND is_active = true ORDER BY created_at DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant_qna ( question, answer, is_owner, restaurant_id, is_active, created_at ) VALUES ( #{question}, #{answer}, #{isOwner}, #{restaurantId}, true, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant_qna SET is_active = false WHERE id = #{qnaId}
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, u.nickname as userName, u.email as userEmail FROM restaurant_qna q LEFT JOIN users u ON q.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN restaurants r ON q.restaurant_id = r.id WHERE r.owner_id = #{businessUserId} AND q.is_active = true ORDER BY q.created_at DESC
